testcase.name: Validar que el usuario que inicia sesion sea el mismo que ingresa al aplicativo
testcase.system-out: Given url 'https://www.googleapis.com/identitytoolkit/v3/relyingparty/verifyPassword?key=AIzaSyC7xBnSXBOT44sr3mdV4Zu8aN1-TouM9vQ' . passed When request .............................................................. passed And method Post ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * def email_password_info = response.email ................................ passed * def idToken = response.idToken .......................................... passed Given url 'https://www.googleapis.com/identitytoolkit/v3/relyingparty/getAccountInfo?key=AIzaSyC7xBnSXBOT44sr3mdV4Zu8aN1-TouM9vQ' . passed When request {"idToken": #(idToken)} ...................................... passed And method Post ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * def email_account_info = response.users[0].email ........................ passed And match email_password_info == email_account_info ....................... passed Given url 'http://192.168.18.5:8080/' ..................................... passed And path 'usuario/save' ................................................... passed And request ............................................................... passed When method POST .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * def contadorVehiculos = $.vehiculos.length() ............................ passed * def usuario = response.id ............................................... passed
